channel.title: Vestige-x|Customs|Community
channel.description:
[IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/3736913.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://vestigex.com"]Official Website[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://community.vestigex.com"]Official Community[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://facebook.com/vestigex317"]Official Facebook[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://twitter.com/realvestige"]Official Twitter[/URL]
Play Now: [URL=http://"http://vestigex.com/client.jar"]Here[/URL]
[SIZE=4]Server Features:[/SIZE]
- Skills exceed 99. - Training exceeds 99, with fun new training methods. - Highscores - Double Exp Weekends - Hosted on a Dedicated Server. - Achievements System With Custom Titles/Points. - Clue Scrolls With Various Rewards. - Ancient Effigies/Dragonkin Lamps - Duel Arena & Staking. - All skills work. - Flawless Pking - Loyalty System - 100+ Custom Items - Custom NPC's - Full Screen HD Supported - [B]Active[/B] Community - Summoning & Construction - Custom Interfaces - Custom Bosses - Weekly Updates - 10+ Bosses - Endless Hours Of Content. + More.
[SIZE=4]Server Background:[/SIZE]
You may have heard of Vestige-x. If not here's a few facts about us:
- We Turned One Year Old In March 2014. - We've reached a maximum of 75 players online at one time. - Our staff are friendly and helpful - Our developer cares about our community. - Suggestions are what make our server.
